name: app.R
My_shiny_app.Rproj
content:
Version: 1.0

RestoreWorkspace: Default
SaveWorkspace: Default
AlwaysSaveHistory: Default

EnableCodeIndexing: Yes
UseSpacesForTab: Yes
NumSpacesForTab: 2
Encoding: UTF-8

RnwWeave: Sweave
LaTeX: pdfLaTeX

name: shinnyApptest.R
content:
usethis::use_git_config(
  scope = "user",
  user.name = "ManickLeolin",
  user.email = "manicleolin2@gmail.com",
  init.defaultbranch = "main"
)
install.packages("shiny")
library(shiny)
